label: DESI Dark Energy Alignment
mathematical_goal: Verify that PM dark energy predictions (w₀, wₐ) align with DESI DR2 2025 data to within 0.5σ combined tension
theoretical_significance: The dark energy equation of state parameters are the most stringent test of v16.2. Both w₀ = -23/24 and wₐ = -1/√24 are derived from the single topological invariant b₃ = 24 with zero free parameters. The combined agreement with DESI DR2 at 0.48σ represents the best cosmological fit in the theory's history, validating the 'pure geometry' approach.
